title: Lithium–sulfur pouch cells with 99% capacity retention for 1000 cycles
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7047-7057
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02149E, Paper
Huangwei Zhang, Yidan Zhang, Chen Cao, Wanli Zhao, Kai Huang, Yi Zhang, Yue Shen, Zhen Li, Yunhui Huang
A SPAN‖Gr pouch cell was developed using high energy density SPAN as the cathode to avoid the shuttle effect and long cycling stability Gr as the anode to exclude the interference of lithium metal.
